Chapter 5 Results 5.1 Choropleth Map showing commuter-packed counties and covid cases.

Chapter 5 Results 5.1 Choropleth Map showing commuter-packed counties and covid cases. In our exploratory analysis, we discovered that commuters have a positive correlation with the Covid case grow. The following choropleth map shows some interesting patterns: The heatmap shows the percentage of labor working outside county of residence. Deeper the color of the county is, the more ratio of workforce commutes outside the county. The teal colored circles represent the number of cumulative cases within each month of 2020. The general pattern indicates and deeper the color is, the more likely that corresponding counties and the surrounding counties experience sharp growth in covid numbers.
